Mission Statement

Connecting Worlds is bringing real-world solutions to make space exploration accessible to everyone.

Next

Who We Are

We are a group of students and graduates from a variety of places and backgrounds, with one goal in mind: to bring every world together through acheivable exploration.

Next

Our main project: LPS

LPS stands for Lunar Positioning System. 32 tiny but powerful CubeSats will orbit the Moon, giving devices on the surface the ability to know their position. No heavy machinery required, our LPS receiver is just like existing GPS receivers, so any low-cost rover can have the autonomy to explore the whole Moon with a reliable way to find its way around.
Our first satellite, Conectito, is ready to be launched.
